# MindCheck Tools

> Free, private mental health self-checks. Your answers are scored in your browser and never stored.

MindCheck Tools provides validated, evidence-based mental health screening instruments as free, private web tools. All scoring happens client-side — no accounts, no login, no data collection.

## Self-Check Tools

### PHQ-9 Depression Self-Check
- URL: https://mindchecktools.com/phq-9-depression-test
- Description: 9-question validated depression screener (Patient Health Questionnaire-9). Scores 0-27 across minimal, mild, moderate, moderately severe, and severe ranges.
- Time: ~2 minutes
- Source: Developed by Drs. Spitzer, Williams, and Kroenke. Public domain.
- Questions answered: Am I depressed? How severe are my depression symptoms? What does my PHQ-9 score mean?

### GAD-7 Anxiety Self-Check
- URL: https://mindchecktools.com/gad-7-anxiety-test
- Description: 7-question validated generalized anxiety screener. Scores 0-21 across minimal, mild, moderate, and severe ranges.
- Time: ~2 minutes
- Source: Developed by Drs. Spitzer, Kroenke, Williams, and Löwe. Public domain.
- Questions answered: Do I have anxiety? How bad is my anxiety? What does my GAD-7 score mean?

### AUDIT Alcohol Use Screen
- URL: https://mindchecktools.com/audit-alcohol-test
- Description: 10-item WHO alcohol screening tool to reflect on relationship with alcohol. Scores 0-40 across low-risk, hazardous, harmful, and possible dependence ranges.
- Time: ~3 minutes
- Source: World Health Organization. Public domain.
- Questions answered: Do I drink too much? Is my drinking a problem? What is AUDIT alcohol screening?

### AUDIT-C Quick Screen
- URL: https://mindchecktools.com/audit-c-alcohol-screen
- Description: 3-question brief alcohol screen used in primary care settings worldwide.
- Time: ~1 minute
- Source: Derived from WHO AUDIT. Public domain.
- Questions answered: Quick alcohol screening, brief alcohol use assessment.

### Work Stress & Burnout Check
- URL: https://mindchecktools.com/work-stress-check
- Description: 12 original questions about work demands, control, support, and recovery.
- Time: ~3 minutes
- Questions answered: Am I burned out? Is my work stress normal? Work-life balance assessment.

### Mental Load Calculator
- URL: https://mindchecktools.com/mental-load-calculator
- Description: See how planning, remembering, and organizing is distributed at home.
- Time: ~3 minutes
- Questions answered: Who carries the mental load? Household labor distribution.

### Sleep & Mood Reflection
- URL: https://mindchecktools.com/sleep-and-mood-check
- Description: Explore how your sleep quality, habits, and mood affect each other.
- Time: ~2 minutes
- Questions answered: Is poor sleep affecting my mental health? Sleep-mood connection.

## Important Disclaimers
All tools are for educational and self-reflection purposes only. They are NOT a diagnosis, medical advice, or treatment recommendation. Always consult a qualified healthcare professional for mental health concerns. All responses are processed entirely in the browser and are never stored or transmitted.

## Technical Details
- Framework: Next.js (static export compatible)
- Hosting: Vercel
- Privacy: Zero server-side data collection, no accounts, all scoring is client-side JavaScript
- Ads: Google AdSense (ca-pub-7171402107622932) — ads never access screening responses
- Analytics: Google Analytics with Consent Mode v2
